title: Meg Ryan and fiancé John Mellencamp 'split' after eight year romance
text:

Meg Ryan , 57, and John Mellencamp , 68, have reportedly 'split' and ended their engagement, according to US Weekly .

The US publication claimed the actress was the one to break it off and and said she has "no regrets".

It had previously been speculated that the couple had split after Meg was spotted out at the weekend without her engagement ring, and appeared to be in good spirits.

The pair have had an on and off relationship over the years, having first started dating in 2011.

(Image: Getty Images)

The magazine's insider revealed: "She'd had enough and ended [their engagement]. She has no regrets."

Rumours of the duo's split first started circulating after eagle-eyed fans noticed the couple haven't been pictured together since May.

Their on/off romance has hit the headlines over the years.

They broke up in 2014, and John dated Christie Brinkley before reconciling with Meg later in the year, but they eventually cooled things off again in 2015.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

The two reunited once again in 2017, before getting engaged in November 2018.

The Sleepless In Seattle star announced their engagement in an Instagram post with a sketch of the pair with the caption, 'ENGAGED.'

Apparently geography was to blame for their previous splits as they struggled with the distance between them - Meg lived in New York while John was based over 700 miles away in Indiana.

In 2013, John admitted he wasn't a fan of the Big Apple: "I'm too sensitive to live here. I can’t see poor people. I can’t see suffering. I can’t see the trash on the streets."

(Image: FilmMagic)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Her cancelled engagement would have been a second marriage for former America's Sweetheart Meg, who divorced Dennis Quaid in 2001.

The When Harry Met Sally star and Dennis were married for 10 years, but their relationship broke down when she had an affair with Russell Crowe on set of The Proof Of Life.

Meanwhile, John is a seasoned pro at marriage, having been divorced three times.

(Image: WireImage)

Meg - who got her break in 1986's Top Gun - has a son Jack, 27, with Dennis and an adopted daughter Daisy, 15, while John has five children from his three marriages.

He is father to daughters Michelle, 48, with Esterline; Teddi, 37, and Justice, 33, with Granucci; and with Irwin, sons Hud, 25, and Speck, 24.

Mirror Online has contacted Meg's reps for comment.
description: The couple have reportedly called it quits on their relationship and broke off their engagement
